resources.string: Game is simple, don\'t run out of time! During game different boxes will appear randomly on screen - boxes with positive values and boxes with negative ones. By tapping box you will get amount of points written on box and also some time - e.g. +2 box will bring you 2 points and allmost 1 second, but if you tap -5 it will take-away 5 points and subtract around 2 seconds.

Also try to get as much time in one moment as possible, because that affects final score (e.g at one moment you have 33.2 s and value 33.2 will be added to your score as final score). If yours maximum time is not bigger than 20 seconds you will not get any bonus.
One last thing - if boxes overlay and you tap there - you will tap BOTH boxes - so be careful! Good luck!
